author: Peerzada Ashiq
text:
Describing the attack on Kashmiri students in Rajasthan, by some right-wing activists as “a worrying factor for students and parents,” J&K Pradesh Congress Committee Chief G.A. Mir said, “The Centre should take cognisance as to why only students from J&K are being harassed.”

CPI (M) MLA M.Y. Tarigami called upon “democratic forces and human rights groups to strongly impress upon the State and the Central governments to take effective measures to avert such happenings.”
title: ‘Harassment’ of J&K students deplored
